The Sinhala: language caption on the post specifically mentioned the "American Citizenship Renunciation Certificate of Mr. Gotabaya Rajapaksa," linking the claim to the image.
Gotabaya Rajapaksa: a Sri Lankan politician, acknowledged being a dual citizen of Sri Lanka and the United States but claimed to have renounced his American citizenship.
